NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL.description: Your Supabase project URL (e.g., https://kzacbvqfsribzhqwfnfd.supabase.co). Find this in Supabase Dashboard → Settings → API → Project URL

NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY.description: Your Supabase anonymous/public API key. Find this in Supabase Dashboard → Settings → API → Project API keys → anon
